dimensions.label: Problem-Solving Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach solving complex problems?

options.description: Your FarTwin will break down problems into smaller, manageable parts and analyze each component to find a solution.
Your FarTwin will rely on their instincts and experience to make connections between seemingly unrelated ideas and find innovative solutions.

dimensions.label: Collaboration Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin engage with others in a collaborative setting?

options.description: Your FarTwin will confidently express their opinions and assert themselves as a leader, but also be willing to listen to and consider others' perspectives.
Your FarTwin will actively seek input from others, prioritize consensus-building, and strive for mutually beneficial outcomes.

dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach taking calculated risks?

options.description: Your FarTwin will carefully weigh the potential benefits and drawbacks of a risk before making a decision, often opting for caution.
Your FarTwin will be willing to take bold action, even if it means facing uncertainty or failure, in pursuit of significant rewards or opportunities.

dimensions.label: Learning Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach learning and acquiring new knowledge?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be self-motivated, setting their own pace and prioritizing topics that interest them most.
Your FarTwin will prefer a more structured approach, such as following a set curriculum or working under the guidance of an instructor.

dimensions.label: Data Analysis Skill
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin interpret and utilize data in their decision-making?

options.description: Your FarTwin will thoroughly examine data, looking for patterns, trends, and correlations to inform their decisions.
Your FarTwin will focus on understanding the overall context and implications of data, rather than delving into minute details.

dimensions.label: Global Perspective
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin consider the global impact of their actions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will take a holistic view, considering how their decisions might affect people and environments across different regions and cultures.
Your FarTwin will focus primarily on local or near-term concerns, with less emphasis on global implications.

dimensions.label: Technical Comfort
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach working with technology?

options.description: Your FarTwin is highly comfortable using technology, able to navigate complex systems and leverage tools to achieve goals.
Your FarTwin has a basic understanding of technology but may struggle with more advanced concepts or require guidance when working with digital tools.

dimensions.label: Social Confidence
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin interact with others in social situations?

options.description: Your FarTwin is comfortable initiating and maintaining conversations, often taking the lead in social interactions.
Your FarTwin may struggle to initiate or participate in social conversations, preferring quieter, more low-key settings.
